text: For <extra_id_0> TNF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ELISA , 96-well plates were coated with <extra_id_0> TNF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> coating ( TN3-19 , eBioscience ) and detection ( R4-6A2 , eBioscience ) antibodies .
IFNalpha and <extra_id_0> IFNbeta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein levels were determined with an ELISA kit ( PBL Biomedical Laboratories ) .
For IFNgamma ELISA , 96-well plates were coated with IFNgamma coating ( XMG1.2 ) and detection ( R4-6A2 ) antibodies ( eBiosciences ) .

Detection of <extra_id_0> MCP-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> KC <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> TNF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IL-1beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in BAL fluid was performed using Bioplex ( BioRad ) technology according to the manufacturer 's instructions .
Milliplex technology ( Millipore ) was used for the detection of MIP-2 in BAL fluid .
